title: LocalizedString

text: LocalizedString

title: New Attack: Fireball
name: Fireball Attack
text: Tap repeatedly to deal damage.

title: How To Attack
name: Flamethrower Attack
text: Hold and drag to deal damage.

title: New Attack: Lock On
name: Lock On Attack
text: Swipe to attack up to 3 targets.

title: Fireball
name: Fireball
text: Deals damage to all buildings in the affected area.

title: Battle Cry
name: Battle Cry
text: Increase the damage of this and the next dragon to attack

title: Chain Lightning
name: Chain Lightning
text: Strikes buildings with lightning that chains randomly

title: Explosive Shield
name: Explosive Shield
text: Absorbs damage until depleted then explodes dealing damage to nearby buildings

title: Cloak
name: Cloak
text: Dragon becomes invisible and cannot be targeted until it attacks

title: Cure Poison
name: Cure Poison
text: Removes poison.

title: Evasion
name: Evasion
text: Dragon moves quickly over buildings and have a chance to dodge incoming projectiles

title: Vampiric Touch
name: Vampiric Touch
text: When active gain health and rage on building destruction

title: Freeze
name: Freeze
text: Freezes all buildings in the affected area

title: Havoc
name: Havoc
text: Dragon deals greatly increased damage with its attacks

title: Rejuvenate
name: Rejuvenate
text: Restores dragon's health over time.

title: Healing Mark
name: Healing Mark
text: Places a mark on a building that heals the Dragon that destroys it

title: Hover
name: Hover
text: Hover

title: Wind Wall
name: Wind Wall
text: Deflects incoming projectiles

title: More Rage
name: More Rage
text: Rage regenerates at faster rate

title: Death Gaze
name: Death Gaze
text: Dragon's next attack deals enough damage to destroy most buildings instantly

title: Reverse Projectiles
name: Reverse Projectiles
text: Reflects incoming projectiles back onto the attackers

title: Invincibility Shield
name: Invincibility Shield
text: Dragon becomes invincible briefly

title: Self Destruct
name: Self Destruct
text: Dragon self destructs and deals tremendous damage to every tower in the area

title: Lockdown
name: Lockdown
text: Disables a building until the next time it takes damage.

title: Entrap
name: Entrap
text: Disables a building for a short duration, or until it takes damage

title: Elemental Mayhem
name: Elemental Mayhem
text: Causes Storm towers, Lightning towers, Fire/Ice turrets to attack each other.

title: Speed Up
name: Speed Up
text: Speed Up

title: Stoneskin Shield
name: Stoneskin Shield
text: Greatly reduces damage taken.

title: Summon Warrior
name: Summon Warrior
text: Summons a spectral Warrior Dragon to fight for you.

title: Teleport
name: Teleport
text: Dragon teleports past an entire island

title: Intimidating Roar
name: Intimidating Roar
text: Deals damage to buildings nearby and reduces their damage for entire fight

title: Thunderstorm
name: Thunderstorm
text: Summons a cloud that brings down lightning bolts which does damage over time

title: Sacrifice
name: Sacrifice
text: Dragon takes damage and gains rage immediately

title: Steal Essence
name: Steal Essence
text: Steal essence from the last tower your dragon destroyed. Generates rage when you steal a new spell

title: Spell Flux
name: Spell Flux
text: Explodes one tower and damages nearby towers

title: Frozen Tomb
name: Frozen Tomb
text: Freezes towers and gain shield based on the number of hit towers.

title: Galvanic Overload
name: Galvanic Overload
text: High damage to one building.  Killing building allows to recast and gain rage at cost of health.

title: Seething Spark
name: Seething Spark
text: First cast increases damage.  Second cast discharges, damaging and stunning buildings

title: Rising Phoenix
name: Rising Phoenix
text: If dragon dies during spell duration, explodes back to life and damages towers.

title: Invert
name: Invert
text: Reflects incoming projectiles back onto the attackers for short duration

title: Heat Shield
name: Heat Shield
text: Reduces incoming damage and instantly heals for a small amount. (Mehaten only) If struck by a Spitfire Turret the Solar Energy bar will charge by 25%.

title: Heated Breath
name: Heated Breath
text: Flamethrower deals more damage for duration. (Mehaten only) Any building destroyed while active will grant 2x Solar Energy.

title: Nocturnal Fissure
name: Nocturnal Fissure
text: Opens a vortex for 4 seconds which destroys projectiles. If empowered by Nightfall, channels a portion of that damage into health.

title: Umbral Spike
name: Umbral Spike
text: A shadowy spike emerges from the ground and pierces the targeted tower destroying it.

title: Desiccating Sand
name: Desiccating Sand
text: Launches choking sand that does damage on contact and prevents it from firing or blocking all spells until it takes damage.

title: Crumble to Dust
name: Crumble to Dust
text: Turns the earth at the base of the island's towers into swirling sand that creeps up the sides of each tower. Affected towers deal reduced damage and take increased damage. A second cast on the same towers turns the towers themselves to sand, dealing massive damage!

title: Radiance
name: Radiance
text: Incinerates any projectiles currently in air and heals a moderate amount. Attack changes to Solar Breath which deals increased damage.

title: Nightfall
name: Nightfall
text: Harness shadowy energies to empower the next Ability used and, as a bonus, increase next Lock-On Attack's damage by 50%.

title: Apophet's Shadow
name: Apophet's Shadow
text: Increases Lock-On damage and returns 33% of damage dealt back to Apophet as health healed. Apophet loses these bonuses if shadow is killed.

title: Borrowed Time
name: Borrowed Time
text: Build up Temporal Energy over time. When reduced to 0 health, her ghost will continue to fly forward, allowing you to attack but not use Abilities.

title: Time Shift
name: Time Shift
text: Transform into a cloud, draining Temporal Energy. She cannot attack but can still cast Abilities. Player can cancel this spell by attacking.

title: Ice Shock
name: Ice Shock
text: Penetrates mage towers and freezes and damages buildings in affected area

title: Crystalline Shield
name: Crystalline Shield
text: Several shards of ice protect you, sacrificing themselves to stop projectiles and reducing damage from beam attacks

title: Celestial Dance
name: Celestial Dance
text: Alters the nature of your other spells to heal or generate rage, based on the Light or Dark version of your spell

title: Dreadful Roar
name: Dreadful Roar
text: Inflict nearby buildings with Gloom Clouds and increase their damage taken

title: Malefic Breath
name: Malefic Breath
text: Dragon's flamethrower attack will inflict poisonous Gloom Clouds on targeted buildings

title: Northern Lights
name: Northern Lights
text: Invincible shield that creates Heal Marks or Rage Marks on towers when destroyed, cycled with Celestial Dance.

title: Southern Cross
name: Southern Cross
text: Deals damage to buildings and restore either Health or Rage, cycled with Celestial Dance.

title: Southern Cross (Dark)
name: Southern Cross (Dark)
text: Deals damage to buildings and restore Rage.

title: Southern Cross (Light)
name: Southern Cross (Light)
text: Deals damage to buildings and restore either Health.

title: Cosmic Energy
name: Cosmic Energy
text: Passive: When Celestial Dance is used, removes all debuffs if HP is higher than 50%

title: Daybreak
name: Daybreak
text: Passive: Absorb solar energy from destroyed buildings

name: Summon Warrior
text: Summons a spectral Warrior Dragon to fight for you.

name: Contagion
text: Alternates between a breath damage boost and an area-of-effect tower debuff.

title: Lightning Surge
name: Lightning Surge
text: Strikes target tower with lightning that chains to random nearby towers.

title: Swarm Strike
name: Swarm Strike
text: Fires multiple projectiles at random nearby towers.

title: Summon Swarm
name: Summon Swarm
text: Summons a bug swarm to fight for you.

title: Locust Cloud
name: Locust Cloud
text: Dragon dodges all incoming projectiles and periodically damages nearby towers.

title: Acid Spit
name: Acid Spit
text: Heavily damages target tower.

title: Meteor
name: Meteor
text: Damages and freezes all towers in target area.

title: Invoke: Assimilate
name: Invoke: Assimilate
text: Dragon's Invoked attack deals bonus damage and has increased AOE. Any towers destroyed restore health.

title: Writhe
name: Writhe
text: Dragon cloaks briefly. Upon uncloaking, damages nearby towers.

title: Entropy
name: Entropy
text: Dragon's breath attack poisons towers, causing them to take damage over time indefinitely.

title: Cosmic Gaze
name: Cosmic Gaze
text: Fires a projectile that destroys an automatically chosen tower. Restores health on cast.

title: Evil Eye
name: Evil Eye
text: Toggle to massively increase breath damage and reduce incoming damage. Drains rage while active.

title: Roar from Beyond
name: Roar from Beyond
text: Damages and debuffs nearby buildings. Debuffed towers deal reduced damage.

title: Twisted Visage
name: Twisted Visage
text: Alternates between Mask of Misery and Mask of Mania.

title: Mask of Misery
name: Mask of Misery
text: On cast, dragon takes damage and restores rage.

title: Mask of Mania
name: Mask of Mania
text: Consumes all Hunter Ammo then heals based on Hunter ammo spent.

title: Reality Warp
name: Reality Warp
text: Dragon cloaks briefly. Upon uncloaking, damages nearby towers and deals increased breath damage.

title: Mind Spike
name: Mind Spike
text: Heavily damages target tower. Restores health on cast.

title: Blood Mist
name: Blood Mist
text: Dragon cloaks briefly and recovers hunter ammo. Has increased breath damage after uncloaking.

title: Elder Sign
name: Elder Sign
text: Shields dragon. Next cast removes shield and damages and debuffs towers.

title: Eternal Might
name: Eternal Might
text: Passive: Dragon has massively increased health and breath damage.

title: Awaken!
name: Awaken!
text: Deals area damage and gain brief invincibility. Fully restore health and rage.

title: Touch of the Deep
name: Touch of the Deep
text: Freezes and damages buildings in the target area.

title: Whispers of Madness
name: Whispers of Madness
text: Target tower is forced to attack other towers for a short duration. Tower is heavily damaged when duration ends.

title: Synaptic Wave
name: Synaptic Wave
text: Damages and freezes all towers within range. Towers take additional damage after being frozen.

title: Overcharge
name: Overcharge
text: Dragon gains increased breath damage and rage generation. Destroying towers restores health.

title: Ferocious Dive
name: Ferocious Dive
text: Dragon cloaks briefly and rushes forward. Restores health on cast.

title: Marsh Bolt
name: Marsh Bolt
text: Heavily damages target tower.

title: Prowl
name: Prowl
text: Restores rage on cast. Destroying towers restores health.

title: Ravage
name: Ravage
text: Dragon gains increased breath damage and restores health whenever a tower is destroyed.

title: Curse of Greed
name: Curse of Greed
text: Passive: Dragon doesn't generate rage over time. Destroying towers restores health and rage.

title: STORM BREATH
name: STORM BREATH
text: Dragon gains increased breath damage for a short duration.

title: WING GUST
name: WING GUST
text: Destroys all mid-air projectiles and briefly stuns towers.

title: INVOKE: EXCAVATE
name: INVOKE: EXCAVATE
text: Dragon's Invoked attack deals massive damage and restores health when it becomes ready.

title: HOVER
name: HOVER
text: Dragon cloaks, hovers in-place, and has increased rage generation. Dragon can cast spells and use its breath attack without uncloaking.

title: RAPID COOLING
name: RAPID COOLING
text: Damages all nearby towers and massively decreases dragon's next reload time.

title: SNOWDRIFT
name: SNOWDRIFT
text: Disables all towers in target area until they take damage. Towers cannot attack or use supershots while disabled.

title: SILENT SWOOP
name: SILENT SWOOP
text: Dragon cloaks briefly and recovers hunter ammo. Upon uncloaking, dragon gains increased breath damage.

title: BATTLE SCREECH
name: BATTLE SCREECH
text: Dragon gains increased breath damage for the rest of the battle. Can stack multiple times. Buff applies to all following dragons.

title: AVARICE
name: AVARICE
text: On cast, dragon takes damage and restores rage.

title: SHINING SPLENDOR
name: SHINING SPLENDOR
text: Dragon dodges all incoming projectiles and periodically damages nearby towers.

title: GOLDEN HEX
name: GOLDEN HEX
text: Dragon can rapidly cast two targeted debuff spells. Recasting the spell on debuffed towers destroys them.

title: CHOMP!
name: CHOMP!
text: Heavily damages target tower.

title: WHITEOUT
name: WHITEOUT
text: Damages and freezes nearby towers. Towers take increased damage after being frozen.

title: HIBERNATE
name: HIBERNATE
text: Dragon restores a massive amount of health over a long duration. Can only be used once.

title: ICE LANCE
name: ICE LANCE
text: Fires a projectile that destroys an automatically chosen tower.

title: THREE GIFTS
name: THREE GIFTS
text: Marks a target tower. When marked tower is destroyed, gain health and rage. Can be used three times.

title: HOLIDAY HELPER
name: HOLIDAY HELPER
text: Summons a flamethrower-bearing friend to fight for you.

title: Flame Torrent
name: Flame Torrent
text: Passive: Breath attack that ramps up damage on sustained attack up to cap.

title: Howl of the Underworld
name: Howl of the Underworld
text: Alternates between an area-of-effect tower debuff, health stealing, and single target damage.

title: Petrifying Gaze
name: Petrifying Gaze
text: Freezes all towers within range. Towers take additional damage after being frozen.

title: Gorgon's Guise
name: Gorgon's Guise
text: Dragon cloaks briefly. Upon uncloaking, deals increased breath damage.

title: Smother
name: Smother
text: Disables towers in target area until they take damage.

title: Mark of Hunger
name: Mark of Hunger
text: Spreads heal marks across nearby towers

title: Devour
name: Devour
text: Heavily damages target tower. Restores health on cast.
